StoryLoader
StoryLoader

Takes care of loading StoryPoints from files.

Functions
Load
std::vector<StoryPoint> Load(
const std::string &filename,
TextMarkup *markup,
LuaManager *lua
)

Loads a set of StoryPoints from a .txt file.

Parameters
filename
const std::string&

The path to the .txt file

markup
TextMarkup*

TextMarkup for handling text markup

lua
LuaManager*

LuaManager used for response handlers

Returns

A vector of the loaded story points.
